metadata.title: CVE-2015-8831 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in admin/comments.php in Dotclearbefore 2.8.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the author name in a comment.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
